title: The Complete Book of Gs (gnv64)
description:
The Complete Book ofA Fascenating Exploration of the Spirit World from Apparitions to Haunted Places
by Paul Roland
Arcturus Publishing Ltd. | April 2007 | ISBN: 978-1-84858-140-1 | ePUB | 14.6 mb
and spirits inhabit the world around us. We can hear and see them if we are only sensitive - or psychic - enough to be aware of them.
Re-examining a fascinating assortment of recorded sightings from as far back as Roman times, the author presents a serious look atnot as chain-rattling spooks or cold clouds of swirling mist, but as actual entities with which we share a greater reality.
Nor does he accept thatare merely the spirits if departed people, or energies left behind. Uniquely, Paul Roland provides self-tested evidence on the idea of spirits as the manifestation of people still living, proving that out-of-body experiences are not as rare - or as impossible - as some people might think.
The result is a profoundly fascinating, thought-provoking book that will challenge your beliefs as never before.

CONTENTS
Introduction
Chapter 1 Belief in the soul
Chapter 2 The night side of nature
Chapter 3 Living apparitions
Chapter 4 Talking to the dead
Chapter 5 The uninvited – possession
Chapter 6 Haunted houses
Chapter 7 Spooky sites
Chapter 8hunters
Afterword
Bibliography
Internet resources
